body.name: ULANZI FT-01 Phone Tripod with Holder, Mini Camera Flexible Tripod Stand with Cold Shoe Mount, 1/4'' Screw for Magic Arm, Universal for iPhone 13 Pro Max XS Max X 8 Samsung Canon Nikon Sony Cameras
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 41 mins
features: New Upgrade of Ulanzi Tripod: Made of TPR high elastic rubber material, built-in multi-strand metal core, the service life is 2-3 times that of single-strand metal core. The new version is more stable and durable

Compact Flexible Tripod: The octopus tripod is well made, designed for indoor and outdoor use, and has the flexibility to be used at very low levels, such as for photographing flowers, insects, or wrapping its legs around trees and fences

Comes with Phone Holder: The phone tripod comes with a smartphone mount with a cold shoe mount that allows you to mount a microphone or LED video light for selfie vlogs. One-way sawtooth design, more stable clamping

1/4" Screw for Extension: 1/4" screw on top of the camera flexible tripod, you can directly mount DSRL camera. Or additional 1/4' screw on the side to allow you to mount a monitoring magic arm (not included)

Large Clamping Range: The range size of the phone holder is 56-86mm/2.2inch-3.38inch, compatible with iPhone 13 pro max/12/11/11 pro/11 pro max/xs/xs max/8 plus/Samsung note 10/galaxy s10 and more smartphone

More Devices Available: The ball head allows the smartphone clip 180° rotation, no matter phone or camera, support vertical and horizontal shooting. Load bearing capacity up to 2kg, compatible with mobile phones, action cameras, mirrorless cameras, SLRs and more
body.description: ULANZI Phone Camera Tripod FT-01, Octopus Flexible Tripod Stand with Cold Shoe Mount Outdoor Scene, Beyond Imagination It can appear anywhere Seascape (Placed on rocks)Mountain view (Hold on railing / Hold on branch)Street view (Holding in a squat / Hugging a fire hydrant)Sports (Holds on bike / Motorcycle)Indoor shooting (Holding on the armrest of the seat)Daily use (at home on the sofa / desk looking at the phone from a low angle) Lightweight and Portable Total Weight: Only 0.29KG/0.64LB Overall Length: 360mm/14.17inch Load Bearing: 2KG/4.4LB

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us: Founded in 2016 by a team of the photographer lovers, our original vision is not only to collect high quality and stylish products from the world, but also to develop own products with fabulous and yet practical design. We specialize in the development of mobile phone photography and other photographic equipment accessories, mainly based on mobile video accessories such as mobile phone stabilizer, rigs, microphone, LED lights, fixed bracket, lens, tripod,action camera accessories,etc. ULANZI Phone Camera Tripod FT-01, Octopus Flexible Tripod Stand with Cold Shoe Mount Outdoor Scene, Beyond Imagination It can appear anywhere Seascape (Placed on rocks)Mountain view (Hold on railing / Hold on branch)Street view (Holding in a squat / Hugging a fire hydrant)Sports (Holds on bike / Motorcycle)Indoor shooting (Holding on the armrest of the seat)Daily use (at home on the sofa / desk looking at the phone from a low angle) Lightweight and Portable Total Weight: Only 0.29KG/0.64LB Overall Length: 360mm/14.17inch Load Bearing: 2KG/4.4LB

Ulanzi Tips - QA (Frequently Asked Questions): Q1: Does the ULANZI FT-01 camera tripod package include a phone clip? Of course, the set includes a phone clip. And the clamping range is 2.2inch-3.38inch, which is suitable for most mobile phones. Q2: What is the difference between ULANZI FT-01 and ULANZI MT-11? The flexible tripod legs of the new FT-01 use 3 layers of aluminum core, while the MT-11 uses 1 layer of aluminum core, so the tripod legs of the FT-01 will be more durable. Q3: What is in the box? 1*FT-01 Camera Tripod 1*Phone Tripod Mount 1*Packing Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deffinatly worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use is fairly simple. Sturdiness is excellent as well as flexible and stability in use.Size is as expected for this model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rugged and flexible tripod, even after hard use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have had this tripod for an extended period, and it not only is just like when I bought it, but it is extremely flexible and rugged. It is the best one I have used so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It works well as a tabletop stand but the flexibility of the legs is lacking. Doesn’t grip well wrapping around an object - but I do like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I mostly use this phone holder for zoom meetings and it’s perfect for that & watching videos.I have used it a little as a tripod for photos & video and it worked well for that too. I have a larger iphone and it fits fine if you don’t have anything attached to the back of your phone case- if you do then you can still use it if you remove the phone from the case but the larger iPhones can be slippery without a case so be sure to test the grip before letting your phone do a trust fall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is well made and sturdy very flexible but very stiff so it stays where you put it. The mount that holds the camera is very adjustable. I would recommend this product good value for dollar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: When I train my German Shepherd at the training club I need a small tripod so I can put it in the corner out of the way.They finally came up with a phone holder. Push a spot and it pops up. Then put the phone in and push it closed on the phone. Nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little tripod is great
reviews.reviewText: This little tripod is great you can put it almost anywhere and it came with mount that holds my cellphone and now I can use this tripod to video my birds with and my phone stays still and now not only can I take great videos of my birds now I can show the videos back to the birds and they love seeing themself's and talking back at the videos it's fun for them and me thanks for a great little tripod and the fast shipping to get it here

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's just ok
reviews.reviewText: Based on the sellers photos. I though this would be far more flexible than it is. It's a bit stiffer than I though it might be. Don't get me wrong. It grips and mostly does its job as described. Just maybe not as grippy as my old gorilla grip. Maybe it gets better the more it's used.

I bought this for my Ricoh Theta X and it is fantastic. I use it for either ground shots or for it to sit comfortably on my desk while I transfer files to my laptop. It is solid for the lighter camera and would recommend for any lighter camera or phone.
Muy buena calidad del material es recistente y muy bonito al tacto. Viene con una base para colocar el celular y el tripie.
Very flexible and outstanding premium quality product
